subject: Re: [junit] Categories and JUnit
msgSnippet: Hi Marc, ... I would be happy to attach JUnit s usual license to any of my code incorporated into JUnit.  At what time and by what means would I do that? Dale
messageBody:
Hi Marc,

> All of these possibilities require that Johannes and/or Dale relicense their codebases under CPL for us, I guess. @Johannes, Dale: Would you do that?


I would be happy to attach JUnit's usual license to any of my code incorporated into JUnit. At what time and by what means would I do that?

Dale

--
Dale Emery
Consultant to software teams and leaders
http://dhemery.com
